div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 07:54 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 65. Windy, with a north northwest wind 22 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 40. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 6 to 11 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 32 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 75. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the morning.

div.p: The purpose of this article is to consolidate all communication being sent too parents through our BlueJay Alert System. All files have been converted to .pdf. If you need a .pdf reader, go to www.adobe.com and scroll to the bottom of the page and download the free reader.

p.a: Devices for eLearning
Seward High School eLearning Plan
Seward Middle School eLearning Plan
If You Need to Contact...

a.aria-label: Read more about SPS Communications and eLearning Resources

div.p: Please only fill out this survey if you do not have a device(Ipad, Chromebook, laptop, desktop) at home that can be used for E-Learning and your child is in grades K-8. In the event that devices will need to be distributed, you will be contacted regarding how to access these devices. We will provide one device per household.

p.a: Survey Link

div.p: If the above link doesn't work, copy and paste the URL listed below into a new browser window.

a.aria-label: Read more about Request Form for E-Learning Device
